name: Evolution Ancient
effect: If you have a Digimon with [Hybrid] in its traits in play, you may use this Option card without meeting its color requirements.  [Main] Your level 4 Digimon can digivolve into 1 Digimon card in your hand with matching colors and [Ten Warriors] in its traits for its digivolution cost, ignoring its level.
security_effect: [Security] Add this card to its owner's hand.
